logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Updated to Springframework 1.1.2. Added coding standards to development docs. Verified that site:generate works with maven 1.0.1.

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Completed apache2 configuration. There is a problem with apache2 config tags not being shown in HTML, unless escaped as HTML-entities. However we don't want entities in downloaded files.

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Did some serious brainstorming on generating configuration

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Added first configuration help section. Modified svnlog to only present log. Have found suggestions on how to present commit statistics for svn, bot none of them work. Added supported command 'whoami'.

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Included stylesheet info in --xml output. Fixed svnlog.xsl. Apparently the XML format has changed since that file was created.

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Fixed configuration checking of URLs. Applied proper content types where needed.

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Added xslt import file for repos.properties. Added simple log output as text. Added svnlog layout xslt that I found somewhere.

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Tried to add localhost url to repository.

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Completed configuration analysis. Added administration navigation. Updated skeleton for configuation help script.

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Moved icons to cicons not to collide woth apache default folder. Need cicons in root because it is default theme and could be overridden by new themes. Adde configuration presentation.

logentry.msg: Added administration ideas and the original shell scripts for reference.

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Added strategy for including file from included file that does not know the path of the running script (phpicalendar/config.inc.php). No longer need changed index.php. Added strategy for including with relative path from included file (phpcalendar.inc.php).

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Fixed authentication, but the design needs a critical review. Added config file for phpicalendar because changes must be there instead of in index.html for them to be included in all scripts.

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Need everything in one folder to avoid path confusion. Seems consecutive include() in php is relative to the script that did the first inclusion.

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Added frames-based navigation. Added cookie handling to default js. Added idea on how to run php-code directly from repository. Added themes folder concept. Changed the logo: removed 1px height from icon. Set logo width/height ratio to be 4x1.

logentry.author: solsson
logentry.msg: Added completely reqorked SVNIndexXSLT. Created shared layout templates in default stylesheet. Shared layout templates match TinyMCE layout. Could probably use TinyMCE for button hovering etc. Added icons. Made logo2 transparent, and using bilinear resize for sharper icon.
